Posts.Content: Hi Charlie Brown I had invasive lobular cancer diagnosis nearly 3 years ago with a pile load of involved nodes. Things will happen quickly now and you'll be ready to kick cancers ass. Take each day at a time when you do start treatment and say YES to every bit of help offered. The ladies here will be ready to help support the best way they can which is great Hugs Dayity xxxx
Posts.Title: Waiting for MRI invasive lobular cancer ER+

Posts.Content: Hi elainio2 I'm feeling your worry at this moment in time im back to the B clinic NXT Wed thought things were going smoothly too. Hopefully you'll get more responce than I did though having said that 2 ladies that I have so much respect for gave me support . Keep your chin up you will be in my thoughts  Hugs Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: MRI scan results

Posts.Content: Let's hope these idiots never have a family member who gets diagnosed with breast cancer but then again would they give a FK
Posts.Title: Today's posts in breast cancer and in radiotherapy.

Posts.Content: Hi Kaz 18 I was diagnosed with exactly the same as you in 2015 my mass was 7cm I also had 22 involved nodes I had 4 fec 4t before mastectomy then 15 rads(that was a doddle) taking 10 years of anastrazole. I'm still here to tell the tale You'll do it Kaz you'll kick it's hairy ass  Loads of hugs xxxxx
Posts.Title: Hormone positive lobular breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi lavindergirl. I had my mamagram back in early June. After it was done she went to see the consultant and came back smiled and said see you NXT year. My letter came in the post 3 days later concerning all was ok . If one hospital can do that then why can't they all. It's not fair that women who have been through so much should have to wait so long. Big hugs Dayity xxxx
Posts.Title: Annual mammogram - how long for result

Posts.Content: Hi treacle321 when I had my MIR scan at the beginning of my treatment they found 2 cysts on my left kidney (same side where breast cancer was)and 5 on my liver and a fybroid in my womb they still sit there after all the treatment the team won't do anything. It's easy for me to say please don't worry because you will  Loads of hugs being sent to you at this time Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: one step forwards....

Posts.Content: Hi rmjd all hospitals do things different I had mammo scan biopsy then results then ct scan and mri then results then treatment plan . The treatment plan is the best cos you can put your hotmail boots on and start kicking cancers hairy arse Hugs Dayity xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Has anyone had a CT scan before diagnosis?

Posts.Content: Hi Nick Nick. A warm welcome. I am in remission a year now. Lymph nodes are wonderful little things they tend to keep hold of nasty things preventing it to go further I had 22 cancerous nodes and it didn't spread anywhere else. My mass was v large too but they got it all. I panicked made myself poorly to.its been hard going but boy what a feeling you get when it's all over. You will feel that too. All the people on here are wonderful and so very supportive. you'll do it  Hugs xxx
Posts.Title: New diagnosis - feel like I'm living a nightmare

Posts.Content: One thing I want to say to you is let your hairdresser shave your head thing is I wanted to be in control of my hair loss so what I did is I took the clipers to my hair (OMG not a good look .)I looked in the mirror and saw a woman that looked like she'd got mange. My kids were in hysterics with laughter. My hairdresser took one look at me and we both burst out laughing. She gave me the shortest cut and I wore my wig I got free from the hospital it looked so real and beautiful xxxxxx
Posts.Title: New diagnosis - feel like I'm living a nightmare

Posts.Content: Hi treacle321 CONGRATS to you refinishing the long walk rads are nowhere near as bad as chemo  When you seeing oncology  Hugs Dayity xxxx
Posts.Title: one step forwards....

Posts.Content: I know how your feeling shirl I got to a point when I just wanted to run away because I was so very tired and down. I spoke to my BCN and she assured me that I would breeze through rads so in the end I did it. It took parking up in the car park longer than it did having a zap of rads. You'll be just fine honest I'm 2 years post treatment and giving the 2 fingers to cancer. Chin up chest out give it some welly Hugs Dayity xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Anyone refused radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi hope you don't mind me jumping in on this but are you ok Leolady  Hugs dayity
Posts.Title: Has anyone had a CT scan before diagnosis?

Posts.Content: They found the involved nodes on the mri scan
Posts.Title: Has anyone had a CT scan before diagnosis?

Posts.Content: Hi shirl3 rads are a doddle I tell you this I had 15 rounds and I whish chemo was as kind no real side affects  Hugs Dayity xxxx
Posts.Title: Anyone refused radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi purplediva yep 22 of the nodes were cancerous and the ma's was a big un but my surgeon slapped it daft no lymphodema on my left side at all so I count my blessings and the angels every night Huvs Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: Has anyone had a CT scan before diagnosis?

Posts.Content: Hi sue get intouch with Macmillan help line they will get a welfare rights officer to call you. I did he was brill . Xxxx
Posts.Title: 2nd chemo course.

Posts.Content: Hi jimmyjam I'm on anastrazole my consultant said that a glass of red wine or another tipple was ok.so I'm having one at xmas lunch and one at the night buffet and a cheeky one before bed yum.  Hugs Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: letrozole and foods that contain alcohol

Posts.Content: Hi linmo that what my consultant said to me . I'm having a cheeky drink of red wine at crimbo. Then that's me till my birthday. There's no real evidence in having the odd drink will bring back cancer or a big fat cream cake . Hugs Dayity xxx
Posts.Title: letrozole and foods that contain alcohol

Posts.Content: Hi everyone. Well I'm not a happy bunny today. Got my letter from ESA saying that I've been kept in the support group for another 6 months after sending them letters from my doc (I had to pay for that one) consultant breast care nurse pain management at the hospital. who all stated because of bone pain with anastrazole arthritis in my knees and deteriation in my bones and terrible tiredness I couldn't work. I phoned them up and asked why after all the info I'd given them from the medical team did they only give me 6 months her answer was YOU'LL FEEL BETTER BY THEN. wow I wish that would be the case  Sorry for the moan Dayity xxx
Posts.Title: ESA

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply. I was self employed before the big C loved my job i find it difficult to drive now because of my knees so this is something I can no longer do.
Posts.Title: ESA

Posts.Content: Hi new dawn Thank you so much for your reply. I was given a macmillan Grant which was a God send to me. I will phone C.A.B tomorrow and the council. Teenagers can only do so much around the house before they start MOANING. I love gardening but can only do small amounts now before fatigue kicks in. Once again Thank you Big hugs Dayity xxx
Posts.Title: ESA

Posts.Content: Hi Angela A Thank you so much for your reply. I've got P.I.P. I fought tooth and nail for it though.  It's sad that we ladies and gents have to fight financially for something and before they give it you  you have to preform like a monkey for them.ive worked 35 years paid in to the system and I found when I needed support financially I had to fight for it. Disgusting.
Posts.Title: ESA

Posts.Content: Hi bids24 Thank you for your reply  yea they've kept me in the support group for another 6 months. Finances are hard a the mo.but keeping my head just afloat
Posts.Title: ESA

Posts.Content: Hi optimistic I had a high score my BCN said that they score levels up too 300 mine was 250 very highly fuelled  she said it was a good thing because I would respond well to anastrazole. Sadly for me my chemo didn't work though I had 4 fec and 4 T. Maybe the high score had something to do with it too. I've been on anastrazole for 14 months now Hugs Dayity xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Er 6

Posts.Content: Hi optimistic I had a high score my BCN said that they score levels up too 300 mine was 250 very highly fuelled  she said it was a good thing because I would respond well to anastrazole. Sadly for me my chemo didn't work though I had 4 fec and 4 T. Maybe the high score had something to do with it too. I've been on anastrazole for 14 months now Hugs Dayity xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Er 6

Posts.Content: My 3 friends had TNBC we went down that long road together met up once a week for lunch they had large tumours and node involvement and still around 3 years later. They too worried because unlike me they couldn't have anastrazole theyve got new boobs (which look fantastic) and theyre living years in advance instead of days. You'll do it . Put your trust in your care team. Keep your chin up .sending you tons of hugs xxxxx
Posts.Title: Tumour didnt shrink. Finished chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Jmp it's great news if you live in LONDON but not so great if you live in the shires or up north Hugs Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: Cancer One Stop Shops Information

Posts.Content: Hi Kaz I was sat in your place nearly 3 years ago I was hormone redemptive I had   4 fec 4 t chemo before my mastectomy to shrink the mass I also had 20+ cancerous nodes it didont work either  It's easy for me to say don't worry because you will. Your surgeon will sort it and so will radiotherapy (it's a doddle much easier than chemo) Talk to your team tell them how you feel your not on your own xxxx
Posts.Title: Tumour didnt shrink. Finished chemo

Posts.Content: Hi. I can remember when I was diagnosed my KIDS but 1were in bits I was the only one not crying. Every app I went to I took one of the older kids 18.19 23.24.and 38 the other 3 were a little young to understand. I guess my positive thought paterns helped(I wanted to fall apart some times)my 24 year old would laugh and joke about the big C. He would have us all laughing even when my hair fell out and I was walking around like a 90 year old after each round chemo. I think families stay strong and positive for us they react in different ways. Lots of hugs being sent to you xxxxx
Posts.Title: Loved ones' strange reaction

Posts.Content: Hob nail boots lol
Posts.Title: Flu

Posts.Content: Hi leolady hugs are being sent your way as you start your chemo hotmail boots on ready to kick it's ass Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: Flu

Posts.Content: Hi I had to do this when I had rads nearly 3 years ago they said that I was one of the first lot of ladies to do this as it was a new thing nottingham city  hospital was doing it's so easy and they help you all the way through so don't worry you'll be just fine  Hugs Dayity xxxx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy - DIBH technique

Posts.Content: Hi gable girl I've found that P.IP assessors Ask stupid questions non really relevant  to the illness it seems that they have a one fits all attitude. They love it when we have to preform like monkeys and then to be told "sorry no can do". 3 of my friends were told NO .all going for the same treatment my BCN told me a great% of women with BC are turned down. Sad but I suppose the money has to go on a more needy goverment funding project.
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Hi veronica don't forget to perform well for these people to them you are a number no more no less
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Hi bigguy thanks so much for your reply but I was awarded P.I.P after fighting a huge battle. The reason why I'm angry is because there's lots of ladies on here me as well that have had to fight for financial support during the biggest battle of our lives. I think it's fantastic that some ladies don't need this but lots do. The Macmillan team were fantastic they helped me so much too. Hugs Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Hi gable girl I'm not putting people off at all in fact is love our ladies to bombard p.i.p with applications. It's not only me that's had negative experiences Capita the company p.i.p employes to deal with applications are rude I've taped one conversation I had with an operative. SO LADIES IF YOU FEEL YOU NEED XTRA SUPPORT GET YOUR FORMS IN LETS SEE WHO GETS P.I.P AND WHO DOESN'T.  Oh a little story for you too.3 years ago I drove my aunt to an appointment for benifit she had spinal problems couldn't walk properly anyway got there lift was broken we were told she would have to climb the stairs to the ASSESMENT area so me being an outspoken cow said to them there was 2 choices on the table 1 was for someone to come downstairs to speak to her and other people or 2 l was going to phone the local and national newspaper. Well we and other people were assessed down stairs so I will tell you again. P.I P AND OTHER BENIFIT AGENCIES PUT THE TRAPS DOWN ONE SIZE FITS ALL.
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Hi nikki65 that's great news so pleased you didn't get a right prat for your ASSESMENT  could I ask did you get  your origonal form from capita? It would be interesting to know because I've been doing my homework and found loads of home visits were denied and people had to travel between 18-30 miles for theirs which I feel is an ABSALUTE joke but hey who am I to comment. I've sent my forms off will loads of letters lets see what happens. Hugs Dayity xxxx
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Hi gable girl I beg to differ on the home visit when on chemo again I've done my homework most ladies were told to go to the ASSESMENT even when they were on chemo.3 ladies I knew personally had to go all turned down and took it to tribunal sad thing is women and men have enough on their plates dealing with the crap that chemo radiotherapy surgery pills psychological affects throw at them. As I've said before everyone is a one size fits all
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Hi veronica14 I was one of the lucky ones that was awarded P.I.P.  when you go take a representative with you preferably someone who helps you around the home and out and about. You need to tell them how bad you are how you are awake at night worrying having anxiety problems tears and the feeling of helplessness.  How a family member or friend helps you and prompts you in doing things and that you need support showering and bathing. If you have problems dressing tell them. You need to tell them how you medication has left you with side affects tell them if your having counselling get as many letters as you can supporting EVERY DAMN THING. Some of these medical proffesional are NOBS and some are ok.I had the NOB and I ripped him big time. DO NOT BE ASHAMED TO CRY AT YOUR ASSESMENT . HUGS Dayity xxcxxx
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: You will be going feeling at your worst NO MAKE UP CASUAL CLOTHES NO WIG BASICALL YOUR GOING TO LOOK THE WAY YOU FEEL.  ROUGHER THE BETTER  HUGS Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Hi veronica it seems that cancer is not a good enough reason to be awarded P.I.P these idiots don't take what the oncology BC and surgical team seriously if they did it would be awarded to all cancer patients but NO THEIR MEDICAL PROFFESIONALS SEEM TO KNOW MORE ABOUT  YOU THAN THE TEAM THAT ARE FIGHTING TO KEEP YOU HERE ON THE PLANET. No one suffering cancer should have to prove to anyone what they're going through to get a frikin pitence of money. RANT STILL NOT OVER HUGS Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Hi strawb11 Not good at all did they tell you that you have the right to appeal.  Hugs Dayity xxx
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Hi jowoomot I'm not saying people have to lie I'm saying you have to be yourself when you go for an assessment  some women get their make up on dress their wig glam up. That gives these idiots a whoop whoop first impression she's ok she's glanced up no p.i.p. for her. These people lay traps for claimants.  Some people don't need pip but a great % do but to these idiots your a one size fits all. Have you had an assessment done? (Not being offensive to you) they're degrading condescending and heats most offensive is that they ignore what medical PROFFESIONALS letters have to say.they feel they're above everything because they're employed by the goverment. My experience of cancer was and still is haunting me both mentally and physically .I so want to turrn the clock back 3 years to be that woman who worked 40 hours a week do my gardening dress my long hair up wear a bra that I put 2 breasts in. Go into town on my own NOT depending on anyone not having to sleep downstairs not having a carer that helps me shower every day the bloody list goes on and on for what 220 quid. No I'm not lying and I'm certainly not encouraging anyone else to either. THEY NEED TO BE HONEST WITH THEMSELVES
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Veronica speak to your doc about that home visit when they send him forms to fill in that will be one of the questions they will ask  Hugs Dayity  xxxx
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Hi everyone just wanted to keep all the ladies in the loop who are getting P.I.P. Got my ASSESMENT form through today to 're apply for P.I.P I was awarded it for 3 YEARS. Anyway looked at my award letter to find I've only been 2 years into my award. Just phoned them up to ask why well I was told people are being 're assessed 1 YEAR BEFORE AWARD ENDS WOW FOLKS
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Anyway ladies get everything sorted asap as it will prevent payments from being stopped. Don't forget to see your doc and tell him if you can't travel to your ASSESMENT. P.I.P will send a form to your GPS asking if you can travel. Why do i know this well my doc told me Hugs Dayity
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Hi taralou. These idiots lay traps down for claimants thing is we've all sat in the shifty cancer boat and some of us are still having counciling because of it. My daughter comes round to my house 7 days a week  she also stays over when I'm not in a good mind frame. I have 2 son's but they don't want to help their mother change her incontinence pad in the night.ive fell down stairs and ended up in casualty too I even offered them to stay over a week and see how my life is after cancer treatment but it was declined. You are a number to these idiots no more no less I wish you all the luck in the world because you'll need it
Posts.Title: Does anyone know anything about PIP?

Posts.Content: Hi Lucy I know how you feel I'm off to the breast clinic tomorrow after the doc found thickening on my right boob I was told it could be a few things and may not be the cancer that has returned. When is your app? Try to keep BUISY if you can little ones are always needing attention. Hugs Dayity xxx
Posts.Title: worry

Posts.Content: Hi tarneh.so pleased all went well on your rads. I too thought about reconstruction but have decided to stick with my prostetic boob I've called Doris. You normally get that a few weeks after your mastectomy and the scar has healed well.in Nov I'm going back for a stick on boob you have to wait 6 months I was told to have one. I hope then I can wear a normal bra. Good luck on what you choose to do  Dayity xxxx
Posts.Title: R1 R2 Update after radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Thank you crystaljuju.it's nice to laugh again intead of crying buckets of tears through this terrible battle we all have had to face oh how we will cry buckets of tears when a cure is found roll on for that day. Dayity xxxx
Posts.Title: R1 R2 Update after radiotherapy

Posts.Content: That's good news that they're getting your treatment plan in place. Yea I would ask her too. A great tip before you go to see your team write things down ready to ask them. And take someone with you too.will be thinking about you keep strong and keep in touch xxx
Posts.Title: CT Scan results -

Posts.Content: Hi Gracie. Yep been there they found a growth in my womb that turned out to be a fibroid  5 liver systs  (wow) and a kidney systs my mind was all over the place before they told me what they were . My bcn  said we have so many lumps and things that are harmless in our bodies but it never stops us from worrying. Let us know how you get on lots of hugs xxx
Posts.Title: CT Scan results -

Posts.Content: Hi debo9 I was diagnosed with lobular cancer 2 years ago 22 involved nodes mass was v large. I had 8 chemo mastectomy 15 rads 10 years on anastrazole. I was stage 3 grade c . I have wobbles even now but those words " WE GOT IT ALL" kick me back to reality. When you get your treatment plan you will be in control ready to kick cancers hairy ass. Hugs Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: Devastated and petrified diagnosed with 2cm lobular breast cancer...

Posts.Content: Thank you optimistic. I'm seeing my counsoler NXT week too so she's in for a lot of emotional input from me xxx
Posts.Title: Thickening in right boob

Posts.Content: Hi optimistic saw Mr puthu my consultant he sent me for mammo and scan everything good I don't need to go back till NXT year. The thickening could be caused by meds and lymph fluid .I just want to say Thank you so much for all your kind words and support you are a treasure  Hugs Dayity xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Thickening in right boob

Posts.Content: Hi everyone Thank You so much for your wonderful comments they mean so much  Hugs Dayity xxxx
Posts.Title: Thickening in right boob

Posts.Content: Hi optimistic thank you so much I will let you know what they say my app is 10.10 I look at that time as being a good omen Hugs Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: Thickening in right boob

Posts.Content: But you were there when I needed support xxx
Posts.Title: Thickening in right boob

Posts.Content: Hi Debs went for scan and mammo everything good I don't have to go back till NXT may  Thank you so much for your kindness and support you are a treasure  Hugs Dayity xxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Thickening in right boob

Posts.Content: Well back to the breast clinic NXT week for examination mammo and maybe biopsy. Did self examination on my remaining boob on Mon to find thickening went to the docs he referred me straight away although he said he didn't feel worried . Got back home the bcn phoned me to go in NXT Wed.  Scared stiff pissed off because I thought after 2 years on anastrazole I would be ok . My kids are trying to pacify me but I feel so scared. Hugs Dayity
Posts.Title: Thickening in right boob

Posts.Content: Bless you debs the nurse phoned me this morn my app is 10 10 on Wed she read me back the letter my doc sent he said left mastectomy side normal right side thickening no nodes felt but just check it out for peace of mind.that made me feel a little better . I will let you know what they say and again hugs to you and optimistic for you kind words and support Xxxx
Posts.Title: Thickening in right boob

Posts.Content: Hi puzzler bless you Hugs Dayity xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Thickening in right boob

Posts.Content: Hi leolady Thank you so much Hugs Dayity xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Thickening in right boob

Posts.Content: Hi puzzler Thank you so much for your reply I'm so relieved. I was scared I say in the same room as I did nearly 3 years ago when I was first diagnosed I felt so sick. One lady was sat NXT to her squeezed her hand for support  Hugs Dayity xxxx
Posts.Title: Thickening in right boob

Posts.Content: Deb09 your not a whimp at all what your feeling right now is normal all the ladies on here will reassure you of that and are always there to hold you up and dust you down and give hugs which are so needed at times like this. Your not alone and never will be  Hugs Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: Stressed/Anxious

Posts.Content: Hi again deb09. You feel like that because of the uncertainty.  Every ache and pain will send you in a panic fearing it's spread. It's easy for me to say please don't panic and please don't. I panicked wondering if this" pain of my life" would spread before treatment but it didn't. When you get your treatment plan put your hotmail boots on and aim for it's hairy ass. Huggs Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: Stressed/Anxious

Posts.Content: Hi princess8 I had a fair few nodes removed 22 pos for cancer. Always remember nodes are clever little things they collect crap like cancer and helps stop it spreading. I was a mess when they told me at my post surgery app. My surgeon said they surgically got the cancer. Chemo didn't work on my cancer but rads would have destroyed the stray cells. I'm nearly 2 years post op.its easy for me to say don't worry . Please don't you'll be ok and people on here are ready to give hugs and support when you worry. Hugs Dayity xxxx
Posts.Title: Worry over positive lymph nodes

Posts.Content: Hi kargus I've been on anastrazole fr nearly 2 years and my old fan doodle is sore when I go to the loo . I was told that it's a side affect of these oestrogen suppressing pills .  Surely the hospital would have called you back there if there was a worry. Will be thinking about you NXT week when you go to the docs Hugs Dayity xxxxxx
Posts.Title: well i am now very worried

Posts.Content: Hi I went to see doc about pain when I went for a wee I was running to the loo then could only wee a little at a time. She said to me there was no infection and to go to the pharmacy and get some sachets that would help cystitis. I finished my chemo march 30th this year.I'm now having a glass of cramberry juice each day xxxx
Posts.Title: Chemo side effects once chemo finished

Posts.Content: Hi Denise . If people see adverts about survivors of this damn disease  they would think oh they're ok now and not bother giving money. A friend of our little boy died of a brain tumour 2 years ago. The mother's comments were shocks like this open wallets and purses. We are constantly reminded that we one had cancer every time we undress take the once a day pill driving past the hospital. For me it's going into the local chip shop asking for chips and mushy peas this is a reminder of my chemo days. There's no easy answer to this topic.Dayity
Posts.Title: Advert

Posts.Content: Denise so why are you posting on here surely this site is a constant reminder of terrible cancer days. Will you ignore the next woman who comes on here desperately in need of support and tlc because she will remind you of your cancer days. Wheather this advert offends or pleased sadly it has been put on for a reason Dayity
Posts.Title: Advert

Posts.Content: Sad  to see this sort of thing but it is sometimes true that people die . This promps people into giving money to cancer research and sometimes is the only  way . the goverment gives Jack Sh ite to funding money for treatments to eradicate this damned disease I don't like to see it because it brings back memories id rather not be reminded of.my kids don't like it either. But if it takes adverts like this to prompt people to dig deep on their pockets then so be it. May the new year bring peace and strength to us all Dayity xx
Posts.Title: Advert

Posts.Content: Hi twinkle 51 no tips to give only looking forward and praying that every time we have scans mamagrams they come back clear. I spoke to Macmillan people how they do a fantastic job. Withought their fundraising lots of women men and children would not get the support they so desperately need. As I said the goverment do not give money to our cancer causes. Adverts like this are meant to shock because to some people cancer doesn't knock on their door so why bother. My comment was not meant to offend in any way. Dayity xxx
Posts.Title: Advert

Posts.Content: We can but hope Denise.we can question then will it helpnhelping taking that pill because it's a reminder of those horrible days  to keep cancer at bay will not having scans etc stop us from feeling dread from cancer COMMING back .. My friend who had breast cancer said to me when I had my results and they didn't seem good. "Your here live it the best you can cancers Sh ite but we are the lucky ones"  she went back to work to her desk job 4 weeks after her mastectomy.shes the sort that gets up and on with it Dayity
Posts.Title: Advert

Posts.Content: Hi optimistic  it's a strange feeling when we are told we have the all clear we are told to get on with our lives and we try so hard to do so. I've have lot of pain in my good boob but consultant says he doesn't feel any lumps the mamo is clear but I panic. My counceler is good she helps with my worries yet I still have meltdowns. Cancer leaves us with so many things we all understand what your going through keep your chin up sending hugs . Dayity xxxxx
Posts.Title: Down day

Posts.Content: Hi smiffy25 my thoughts are with you today i had a mri and ct scan after my op cos i had 22 pos lymph nodes. The waiting was terrible i had to wait 2 weeks yat seemed a life time . Xxx
Posts.Title: HAS IT SPREAD - TODAYS THE DAY

Posts.Content: Hi everyone Well finally got to go to my phycology app in regard to pain that's really getting me down . Explained everything about bone pain not being able to sleep fear of recurrence not being able to do the things I used to be able to do. Well after an hour she said she could help and NXT time she would like to talk about my family and past .WTF .
Posts.Title: Psychologist

Posts.Content: Thank you carolyn for your response  I told her that when I was diagnosed my children were in bits I had to be brave for them so it was a case of " come on you lot I'll do it you watch. This was said during chemo after my mastectomy and rads .I would cry when the kids went off to school so they didn't see my pain. She asked me what was my greatest fear my answer canulars and feeling not being in control.i told her that cancer is a bitch but it found a bigger one in me she laughed. Hugs Dayity xxxx
Posts.Title: Psychologist

Posts.Content: Hi birds 24. I'm already in the support group but they want me in for an interview.
Posts.Title: Capability to work intwrview

Posts.Content: Hi djroo thank you for your reply I've been in the group for 18 months. Have a lot of side affects now .anastrazole is a nasty piece of work I must take it the consultant said as I had no response to chemo. I've also been left with a underactive thyroid and atheritis in my knees.  I've worked all my life then get cancer and am hounded back to work. I could say a lot more but this comment would not be posted. Hugs Xxx
Posts.Title: Capability to work intwrview

Posts.Content: Hi Bedford69 I was diagnosed with invasive lobular cancer Sept 2015 started chemo Nov 2017 4 fec and 4 t. Sadly chemo didn't work I had a 60mm mass and 22 involved nodes. So went from stage 2 to stage 3. I had left mastectomy and 15 rads. Now on anastrazole for 5 years 1 year down 4 to go.  Part way through my chemo my T6 in my spine collapsed I'm still in a lot of pain with that. Then in nov 2016 i started to feel very unwell i had the shakes my temp was all over the place i was feeling really down  my ancles began to swell i was paniking so saw my doc he asked me my symptoms and then said he was going to check my thyroid the results came back and YEY HO levothyrocin for the rest of my life. So when im ill my temp is all over the place i cant take medication because it can have an adverse affect because of the levothyrocin.in Feb of this year wI saw my consultant because of bone ache and pains in my knees he made an appointment for me to have a nuclear bone scan and in the meantime told me to take ibuprofen for the pain well that wasn't a wise move cos 3 days later I was on the manor ward as my heart rate was erratic so had to stop that too. Well the cancer hadn't spread but my knees have atheritis in them and I now walk with a stick. I still have pain doc has now put me on cocodamol for the pain. 2 years ago I was as healthy as a butcher's dog i am now a old mare ready for the knackers yard.  Then you get called in for a poxy interview to preform like a monkey. The one thing I have learned since having cancer is I do not suffer fools gladly and this idiotic so called MEDICAL PROFECIONAL WILL EXPERIENCE MY WRATH. Hugs xxxx
Posts.Title: Capability to work intwrview

Posts.Content: Chemo leaves a massive amount of side affects that creep up months and years after treatment after all it's poison that's being pumped into our veins to kill a poison.  I don't think anyone understands unless they've walked in our shoes. ITS the night time that gets to me. There are nights I can't sleep things going through my head then it's the pain. I tell you this I worked full time working with people who were in need I loved my job but can't do it anymore and that's the thing that gets to me you see it's not that I don't want to work it's that I can't work. Any way I forgot to ask you have you gained weight on your medication? I have and that's a git too. Hugs xxx
Posts.Title: Capability to work intwrview

Posts.Content: Hi grogg THANK you for your reply. ITS strange how the ESA medical professional seems to take no notice of doctor bcn and consultant letters. These special people have walked with me since my treatment started yet this amounts to nothing. I phoned these idiot ESA practitioners yesterday they were not prepared to tell me how qualified they are. My son is a medical professional and as he said he knows Jack sh#t about cancer and the pills you have to take after treatment. Anyway I was so pis#sed off I phoned my local MP up my daughter took me to see one of his team. She too could not believe why they've called me in.theyve e-mailed  ESA.  They have cancelled my app till they've assessed my case again. I guess what I'm trying to say is if your called in for a interview and you've got loads of evidence to back up your illness and side affects FIGHT THESE SCUM BAGS ALL THE WAY.WE ARE NOT MONKEYS WHO ARE HAPPY TO PERFORM FOR IDIOTS THAT THINK THEY KNOW IT ALL BUT KNOW JACK SH#T ABOUT IT. RANT OVER FOR NOW HUGS XXXXX
Posts.Title: Capability to work intwrview

Posts.Content: Hi everyone has anyone else had to have a interview at their local benefits office to see if they're capable for work. I've filled the forms out my doc and consultant have sent letters to ESA but they seem to have ignored what they have had to say. Hugs Dayity
Posts.Title: Capability to work intwrview

Posts.Content: Hi volvox ive been on anastrazole for 2 years (another 8 to go) tried weight watchers slimming word cut down on my food portions go for little walks. But still the weight stays . I spoke to my consultant and breast care nurse about it told them what I've been doing I was told that age and the anastrazole is playing a large part to why my weight won't shift. Im 58 post menopausal I put weight on during chemo too . It really used to bother me but now I've got to the point that as long as the dreaded C keeps away I can do size 20. All the best and love yourself for YOU xxxxx
Posts.Title: Exercise and weight loss sick of being fat! Is it the letrosol?
